title: Diploma in Psychiatry: An Overview
headline: Free online course on the anatomy of the brain as well as some mental health disorders like autism spectrum disorder.
description: The free online overview of psychiatry course will teach you about the anatomy of the brain and how emotion, thought and behavior are formed, as well as some metabolic mental health investigations. You will also learn about some mental health disorders with cognitive disturbances, schizophrenic and bipolar disorders, how the autism spectrum disorder affects the learning ability of children, as well as personality and sleep disorders.
courseDescription:
In this course, you will learn about the anatomy of the brain and how emotion, thought and behaviour are formed, and also the roles psychology and psychoanalysis. The pryamidal cell, and the sources of EEG and MEG will also be covered in the course. Then, the course will teach you about the process of mental state examination, NIMHANS, as well as some metabolic investigations to mental health and mental health disorders.

The course will also teach you about some mental health disorders with cognitive disturbances, schizophrenic disorders and also the epidemiology of bipolar disorders. An explnation of anxiety disorders as well as obsessive-compulsive disorders will also be covered in the course. Lastly, the course will teach you about the mental health of adolescence, the autism spectrum disorder which affect the learning ablity of children, as well as personality disorders and the otogeny of sleep.

This course is helpful for learners who want to understand how the mental health of a person can be affected by certain factors and the mental disorders people have to live with. Start this course now to understand how the human works and the processes that can be used to detect the presence of any mental health disorder.
